name: Eunit
short_description:
This tool is based on the junit project.When you add the annotation like this "@test{file="xxx.xlsx",log="console",dbclear="true"} "to you method and give the data with excel. when you start test with a class include main method and extents "TestStarter" and set the test packages name ,It will auto run all testCases which included in the test packages and include the test annotation as this: 1. if cleardb="true" ,Clear the DB then insert the data you need to the DB.
2.Read the test cases and do the test and give back the  test info as   a log file or print on the console.
summary: A  powerful and easy java test tool.
